record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME EN BLOC--S. 1301 AND S. 1305

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading, en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for a second reading and in order to place the bills on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request, all en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
